defs.name: InitializePool
defs.value: InitializePool { authority, staking_mint, staking_vault, reward_mint, reward_vault, pool_signer, pool, token_program }

attributes.value:
account(constraint = staking_vault.mint == staking_mint.key(), constraint =
          staking_vault.owner == pool_signer.key(), constraint =
          staking_vault.close_authority == COption :: None,)

account(constraint = reward_vault.mint == reward_mint.key(), constraint =
          reward_vault.owner == pool_signer.key(), constraint =
          reward_vault.close_authority == COption :: None,)

defs.name: InitializePool
defs.value: InitializePool { authority, staking_mint, staking_vault, reward_mint, reward_vault, pool_signer, pool, token_program }

defs.name: InitializePool
defs.value: InitializePool { authority, staking_mint, staking_vault, reward_mint, reward_vault, pool_signer, pool, token_program }

attributes.value:
account(init, payer = owner, seeds =
          [owner.key.as_ref(), pool.to_account_info().key.as_ref()], bump =
          nonce,)

account(mut, has_one = authority, constraint =! pool.paused, constraint =
          pool.reward_duration_end < clock :: Clock ::
          get().unwrap().unix_timestamp.try_into().unwrap(),)

defs.name: Stake
defs.value: Stake { pool, staking_vault, user, owner, stake_from_account, pool_signer, token_program }

attributes.value:
account(mut, has_one = owner, has_one = pool, seeds =
          [owner.key.as_ref(), pool.to_account_info().key.as_ref()], bump =
          user.nonce,)

defs.name: Stake
defs.value: Stake { pool, staking_vault, user, owner, stake_from_account, pool_signer, token_program }

defs.name: Stake
defs.value: Stake { pool, staking_vault, user, owner, stake_from_account, pool_signer, token_program }

defs.name: Fund
defs.value: Fund { pool, staking_vault, reward_vault, funder, from, pool_signer, token_program }

attributes.value:
account(mut, has_one = staking_vault, has_one = reward_vault, constraint =!
          pool.paused,)

account(constraint = funder.key() == pool.authority ||
          pool.funders.iter().any(| x | * x == funder.key()),)

defs.name: ClaimReward
defs.value: ClaimReward { pool, staking_vault, reward_vault, user, owner, reward_account, pool_signer, token_program }

attributes.value:
account(mut, has_one = owner, has_one = pool, seeds =
          [owner.to_account_info().key.as_ref(),
           pool.to_account_info().key.as_ref()], bump = user.nonce,)

defs.name: ClaimReward
defs.value: ClaimReward { pool, staking_vault, reward_vault, user, owner, reward_account, pool_signer, token_program }

defs.name: ClaimReward
defs.value: ClaimReward { pool, staking_vault, reward_vault, user, owner, reward_account, pool_signer, token_program }

attributes.value:
account(mut, close = owner, has_one = owner, has_one = pool, seeds =
          [owner.to_account_info().key.as_ref(),
           pool.to_account_info().key.as_ref()], bump = user.nonce, constraint
          = user.balance_staked == 0, constraint =
          user.reward_per_token_pending == 0,)

defs.name: ClosePool
defs.value: ClosePool { refundee, staking_refundee, reward_refundee, pool, authority, staking_vault, reward_vault, pool_signer, token_program }

attributes.value:
account(mut, close = refundee, has_one = authority, has_one = staking_vault,
          has_one = reward_vault, constraint = pool.paused, constraint =
          pool.reward_duration_end > 0, constraint = pool.reward_duration_end
          < sysvar :: clock :: Clock ::
          get().unwrap().unix_timestamp.try_into().unwrap(), constraint =
          pool.user_stake_count == 0,)

defs.name: Pool
defs.value: Pool { authority, nonce, paused, staking_mint, staking_vault, reward_mint, reward_vault, reward_duration, reward_duration_end, lock_period, last_update_time, reward_rate, reward_per_token_stored, user_stake_count, funders }

defs.name: nonce
defs.docs: Nonce to derive the program-derived address owning the vaults.

defs.name: staking_mint
defs.docs: Mint of the token that can be staked.

defs.name: reward_mint
defs.docs: Mint of the reward A token.

defs.name: reward_vault
defs.docs: Vault to store reward A tokens.

defs.name: reward_duration
defs.docs: The period which rewards are linearly distributed.

defs.name: reward_duration_end
defs.docs: The timestamp at which the current reward period ends.

defs.name: lock_period
defs.docs: Period to lock staked token and rewards

defs.name: last_update_time
defs.docs: The last time reward states were updated.

defs.name: reward_per_token_stored
defs.docs: Last calculated reward A per pool token.

defs.name: funders
defs.docs:
authorized funders
 [] because short size, fixed account size, and ease of use on 
 client due to auto generated account size property

defs.name: User
defs.value: User { pool, owner, reward_per_token_complete, reward_per_token_pending, balance_staked, maturity_time, nonce }

defs.name: pool
defs.docs: Pool the this user belongs to.

defs.name: reward_per_token_complete
defs.docs: The amount of token A claimed.

defs.name: reward_per_token_pending
defs.docs: The amount of token A pending claim.

defs.name: ErrorCode
defs.value:
pub enum ErrorCode {
    InsufficientFundUnstake,
    AmountMustBeGreaterThanZero,
    PoolPaused,
    DurationTooShort,
    FunderAlreadyAuthorized,
    MaxFunders,
    CannotDeauthorizePoolAuthority,
    CannotDeauthorizeMissingAuthority,
    CannotStakeOrClaimBeforeMaturity,
}
